name: Jeuxvideo.TV Tweaked
description:
Jeuxvideo.TV is a French website specialized in video test and/or trailers broadcasting through Flash videos.

Normally, the main page is filled of unnecessary informations which takes a long time to load it completely.

After I tweaked a few elements, we can see every important things which matters :)

Oh and I chose to deactivate the permanent link because it was too small to be well displayed.
